Hero Description:
I build secure, scalable APIs and high-performance dashboards for businesses.
Specializing in Laravel, Complex Integrations, and Custom SaaS Infrastructure.
About Description: I am a Backend-Focused Systems Architect who turns complex business requirements into reliable software. Beyond code, I lead a specialized technical team (UI/UX, Mobile) to deliver end-to-end digital products. I don't just build features; I engineer scalable systems that drive business growth.

Web App Description: End-to-end development of scalable multi-tenant SaaS platforms and custom Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems tailored to your business logic.
Mobile App Description: Leading the development of high-performance mobile applications with my dedicated team, ensuring seamless integration with robust backend APIs.
Consultation Description: Expert advice on database architecting, roadmap planning, and technology selection to ensure your product scales efficiently from Day 1.
Payment Description: Implementing PCI-compliant payment gateways, secure wallets, and real-time transaction ledgers. Experience with Stripe, Paymob, and custom integrations.
Real-Time Description: Building responsive dashboards and tracking systems using WebSockets (Pusher/Reverb) and Redis for immediate data updates and monitoring.
Integrations Description: Seamlessly connecting your system with third-party services (CRMs, Logistics, Marketing tools) to automate workflows and unify data.
Skills Description: My primary focus is the **Laravel Ecosystem** for its reliability and speed. I complement this with a modern DevOps and Frontend toolset to deliver complete, deployable solutions.
Gap Cloud Description: Leading backend development for a multi-tenant SaaS ERP. Engineered a dynamic role-based permission system, optimized database queries for reporting modules, and implemented real-time inventory tracking.
Seena-Pay Description: Developed core transaction processing logic and secure API endpoints for a payment aggregator. Integrated multiple banking APIs and ensured strict data validation and security standards.
Freelance Description: Delivered 10+ custom projects for international clients. Specialized in fixing performance bottlenecks, refactoring legacy codebases, and building custom operational dashboards from scratch.
AAST Description: Advanced coursework in Algorithms, Data Structures, and Software Engineering patterns.
Cairo Univ Description: Graduated with honors. Developed strong analytical and research skills.

Project 1 Tech: Laravel, Filament v3, Livewire, Redis, MySQL
Project 1 Problem: Building a scalable, multi-tenant ERP system serving 50+ companies with complex permissions and high data volume.
Project 1 Solution: Architected 30+ dynamic modules using Filament v3. Implemented Redis caching for 40% faster load times and robust RBAC for tenant isolation.
Project 1 Outcome: Serves 50+ active companies with sub-100ms dashboard response times.
Project 2 Tech: Laravel, REST APIs, Docker, Paymob, Firebase
Project 2 Problem: Need for a secure, multi-gateway payment infrastructure with real-time transaction tracking.
Project 2 Solution: Designed secure APIs integrating Paymob & other providers. Added Firebase (FCM) for notifications and Zoho CRM/VoIP integrations.
Project 2 Outcome: Improved user engagement by 30% and enabled seamless multi-channel payment processing.
Project 3 Tech: Laravel API, Sanctum, FCM, Google Maps API
Project 3 Problem: Supporting multiple cross-platform mobile apps (HR, Sales, Antifat) with real-time data synchronization.
Project 3 Solution: Built optimized RESTful endpoints for Gap Cloud HR & Sales Apps. Implemented real-time tracking and background sync.
Project 3 Outcome: Reliable backend supporting thousands of daily active users across iOS and Android platforms.
